1.0.1.name: wordpress/revisioner
1.0.1.description:
Clears all revisions from your database. So this way you can keep your database less cluttered and more tidy.

If you find this plugin useful, please consider to make a donation or send a gift to the author (anything will be appreciated).

Features

  • Changes REVISION number for a more reasonable amount or even disable it.
  • Changes AUTO SAVE interval to a wider timeframe so you have less autosaved revisions or even disable it.
  • Locale support. Now available in English and Portuguese. See translation section for more info.
  • Simple, fast, and useful :)

Requirements

  • WordPress 2.8.x or higher (maybe would work on older WP, but not tested and not supported by me).
  • Not tested and not supported on IIS servers.
